import { useState } from 'react' import Task from './Task' import AddTask from './AddTask' const Tasks = () => { const [taskColor, setTaskColor] = useState(false) const taskComplete = (colorComplete) => { setTaskColor(!taskColor) var colorComplete = 'rgba(30, 250, 22, 0.2)' taskColor ? colorComplete = 'rgba(30, 250, 22, 0.2)' : colorComplete = '' } return (
Task Time Importance
Graditude 10:00 AM - 10:30 AM High
Shower 10:30 AM - 10:45 AM Low
Workout 10:50 AM - 11:45 AM Medium
) } export default Tasks
